headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  ECKSTEIN, RUTHANN BEER

snippet: ECKSTEIN--Ruthann Beer, 59, of Englewood, New Jersey, died at home on April 7, 2016 following an illness. Ruthann was born in Cleveland, Ohio to the late Dr. Adam and Susan Beer. Ruthann was a graduate of Barnard College, and received a Masters in Journalism from NYU and a Masters from Columbia Teachers College. Ruthann was a lifelong student of literature and was beloved as a teacher by the members of her many book groups. She is survived by her devoted and loving husband of 35 years, Kenneth Eckstein, by her brother David Beer, and by her sons, Max, Sam, and Zach, and is remembered fondly by her friends and family. Donations in memory of Ruthann may be made to the Museum of Jewish Heritage in New York. Funeral 10am Friday, April 8 at Congregation Ahavath Torah in Englewood, New Jersey. Burial to follow in the Ahavath Torah Cemetery in Saddle Brook, New Jersey. 1/3
